name: Recordable Piano Instrument
description: This is an in browser piano instrument that can be played and recorded with a computer keyboard. It is made using TypeScript and React.js.

name: Car Dealership Website
description: A mock car dealership website. Made with TypeScript and React.js. Styled with TalwindCSS and Emotion.

name: Blab Times Blog
description: A blog I made for my girlfriend! Made with TypeScript, React.js, Astro, Strapi, and TalwindCSS.
